flawed_nl_solution:
9 students have an average age of 8 years so the sum of their ages is 9*8 = <<9*8=72>>72 years
A tenth student who is 28 years old will make the sum 72+28 = 100 years
The new average age will be 100/10 = <<100/10=10.0>>10.0 years
This is 10.0-8 = <<10.0-8=6.0>>6.0 years higher than the previous average.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2.0, not 6.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
